reviews.author: Jakub Kicinski
reviews.summary: Reported spinlock contention in the rx path after a specific commit and suggested that the patch author investigate improving cgroup_file_notify() scalability.

2026-02-28.patch_summary: This patch series aims to improve the scalability of cgroup_file_notify() by reducing lock hold time, adding lockless fast-path checks, and replacing a global spinlock with per-cgroup-file locks.
